page.title: 01HOUSING
page.content: {Brookmans Park and Welham Green form {the two major residential areas in the {block of this study. Brookmans Park {is an established village with large {individual housing units. The village {is particularily well supplied with a {rail connection to London and a small {shopping centre. Welham Green is a {smaller village but this is also the {area within the block where new {housing is occurring. The majority of {the land in the block is used as {farmland,mostly as pasture for {livestock or for crops. There is {little land unused in the block. Worth {mentioning too witin the block is an {important radio transmitter for the {transmission of the BBC. Included {in this survey are details of: housing {and house prices, local entertainment, {lifestyles, local history based on an {interview and education.
